overview.description: Development of a comprehensive About page for Kohelet showcasing company story, metrics, values, team, and conversion elements. This page serves as the trust-building centerpiece for visitors wanting to understand who we are and why we're qualified to handle their automation and software needs.
business_objectives: Build credibility and trust with potential clients
Communicate company values and mission clearly
Convert visitors into leads through strategic CTAs
success_metrics: Scroll depth > 80% for majority of visitors

tasks.title: Define CompanyStory component requirements
tasks.description: Create detailed functional and design specifications for the CompanyStory component, which tells Kohelet's origin story and mission. This component should establish emotional connection and credibility by explaining why Kohelet exists and what problem we're solving.
acceptance_criteria: Component structure defined (layout, sections, content hierarchy)
Visual design pattern specified (alignment with AboutHero style)
Content requirements outlined (story narrative structure, key messages)
Internationalization keys structure defined (about.story.*)
Animation patterns specified
Responsive behavior documented (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Accessibility requirements noted (semantic HTML, ARIA labels)

content_structure: Section heading (e.g., 'Our Story' or 'Why We Exist')
layout_options: Single column narrative with centered text
detailed_requirements.recommended_approach: Single column centered narrative with mission statement highlighted separately, similar to AboutHero layout but with longer-form content

typography.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-display font-semibold tracking-tight text-white

final_specification.accessibility: section with aria-labelledby, h2 for proper hierarchy

tasks.title: Define Stats component requirements
tasks.description: Create detailed specifications for the Stats component showcasing key business metrics: 10,000+ hours saved, 500+ tasks automated, 80% efficiency gain, 50+ clients. This component serves as social proof and credibility builder.
acceptance_criteria: Component layout defined (grid vs. horizontal vs. vertical)
Stat card design specified (styling, hierarchy, iconography)
Content structure for each stat defined (number, label, optional description)
Animation patterns specified (staggered fade-in, number counter animation)
Responsive grid behavior documented (4-col desktop, 2-col tablet, 1-col mobile)
Visual treatment for numbers defined (size, color, weight)
Internationalization keys structure defined (about.stats.*)
Optional: Icon/visual element for each stat

detailed_requirements.layout_pattern: 4-column grid on desktop, 2-column on tablet, 1-column on mobile with subtle borders and gradient backgrounds
animation_requirements: Counter animation for numbers (0 to final value) using GSAP + ScrollTrigger

tasks.title: Define Team component requirements
tasks.description: Create specifications for the Team section, which can be founder-focused or team overview depending on business preference. This humanizes the company and builds personal connection.
acceptance_criteria: Approach determined (founder profile vs. team grid vs. team overview)
Content structure defined (photos, names, titles, bios, social links)
Layout pattern specified (single column, grid, carousel)
Visual treatment defined (profile images, card styling, hover effects)
Bio length guidelines specified (1 paragraph vs. 2-3 sentences)
Internationalization keys structure defined (about.team.*)
Responsive behavior documented
Optional: Social media links (LinkedIn, Twitter) included

approach_options: Option A: Founder-focused - Single profile with detailed bio and photo
Option B: Team grid - 2-6 team members with photos, names, titles, short bios
Option C: Team overview - Description of team expertise without individual profiles
detailed_requirements.recommended_approach: Founder-focused for now, with structure that allows easy expansion to team grid later

content_per_profile.photo: Optional: Circular or rounded square profile photo
content_per_profile.name: Full name
content_per_profile.title: Role/title
content_per_profile.bio: 2-3 paragraph bio highlighting expertise and philosophy

tasks.title: Define AboutCTA component requirements
tasks.description: Create specifications for the AboutCTA component - the conversion-focused call-to-action at the bottom of the About page. This component should compel visitors to take action after learning about Kohelet.
acceptance_criteria: CTA messaging strategy defined (urgency, value proposition, next step)
Visual design specified (full-width banner, contained card, split layout)
Primary CTA button defined (text, action, styling)
Secondary CTA option evaluated (if applicable)
Copy structure defined (headline, supporting text, button text)
Background treatment specified (gradient, solid, pattern)
Internationalization keys structure defined (about.cta.*)
Responsive behavior documented
Link destination confirmed (#contact anchor or separate contact page)

detailed_requirements.messaging_strategy: After learning about Kohelet, visitor should be compelled to start a conversation. Focus on removing friction and offering clear next step.
detailed_requirements.recommended_layout: Centered content with gradient background, similar to hero section but more focused on action

content_structure.headline: Action-oriented question or statement (e.g., 'Ready to Automate Your Business?')
content_structure.supporting_text: 1-2 sentences reinforcing value and ease of getting started
content_structure.secondary_option: Optional: Secondary link (e.g., 'View Pricing', 'See Case Studies')

Hebrew translations completed

copy_guidelines.label_style: Short, clear, benefit-focused (e.g., 'Hours Saved' not 'Total Hours')

tasks.title: Write Values copy (EN + HE)
tasks.description: Write compelling copy for each company value, including titles and descriptions. Values should communicate how Kohelet operates and what clients can expect.
acceptance_criteria: English copy completed for all values (titles + descriptions)
Hebrew translations completed
Each value title is clear and memorable (2-4 words)
Each description explains the value and its client benefit (2-3 sentences)
Values feel authentic and differentiated (not generic corporate speak)
Tone consistent with brand (professional, automation-focused)
All copy keys added to en.json and he.json under about.values.*
Values align with company's actual operating principles

copy_guidelines.value_title_format: 2-4 words, can be descriptive phrase or single concept
copy_guidelines.description_approach: First sentence: what the value means. Second sentence: how it benefits the client.
copy_guidelines.avoid: Generic corporate values like 'Innovation' without specificity. Be concrete.

example_structure.title: Automation-First Mindset

tasks.title: Write AboutCTA copy (EN + HE)

acceptance_criteria: English copy completed (headline, supporting text, button text)
Hebrew translations completed
Headline is action-oriented and compelling
Supporting text reinforces value and reduces friction

copy_guidelines.headline_approach: Question format (e.g., 'Ready to Automate?') or benefit statement (e.g., 'Start Saving 20 Hours per Week')
